description: Let's get started by creating your first wish list. It's simple and quick!

step1.title: Create your list
step1.description: Give your list a name and add an optional description to help your friends understand its purpose.

step2.title: Add items
step2.description: Add the items you want, including links, prices, and images to make selection easier.

step3.title: Share
step3.description: Share the link to your list with friends and family so they can choose gifts.
